snippet: Bad ratings for the Bowl Championship Series bowls are part of the reason the system is being scrutinized, but will one of the limited playoff possibilities turn this trend around?
abstract: Bad ratings for the Bowl Championship Series bowls are part of the reason the system is being scrutinized, but will one of the limited playoff possibilities turn this trend around?
lead_paragraph: It is mildly amusing to read the two different takes on the pitifully low television ratings garnered by Monday night's Bowl Championship Series title game. While the cable industry prefers the headline "ESPN Scores Cable's Second-Largest Audience Ever," everyone else has been quick to point out that it drew fewer viewers than any B.C.S. championship game ever.
